description: Client side event fired when a user clicks a share icon (not Sessions).

contentId.description: the ID of the content being shared.

contentType.description: The type of content that the user is sharing.

location.description: Where the event fired on our application.

screenName.description: The screen where the user clicked the share icon.

spotReliveRating.description: The rating of the surfline session (if being shared).

title.description: The title of the content being shared.
